con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://edb.com/operation/cauc" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:cauc="http://edb.com/ws/cauc" xmlns:tns1="http://edb.com/operation/cauc" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsdlsoap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2000/10/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:edb="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v10"> <types> <schema targetNamespace="http://edb.com/operation/cauc" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v10" schemaLocation="Header.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://edb.com/ws/cauc" schemaLocation="CAUCJob.xsd"/> </schema> </types> <message name="CAUCStartJobReq"> <part element="cauc:CAUCStartJob" name="CAUCStartJobIn"/> <part element="edb:AutHeader" name="SoapHeader"/> </message> <message name="CAUCStartJobRes"> <part element="cauc:CAUCStartJobResponse" name="CAUCStartJobOut"/> </message> <message name="CAUCJobReportReq"> <part element="cauc:CAUCJobReport" name="CAUCJobReportIn"/> <part element="edb:AutHeader" name="SoapHeader"/> </message> <message name="CAUCJobReportRes"> <part element="cauc:CAUCJobReportResponse" name="CAUCJobReportOut"/> </message> <portType name="CAUCJobPort"> <operation name="CAUCStartJob"> <input message="tns1:CAUCStartJobReq" name="caucstartjobreq"/> <output message="tns1:CAUCStartJobRes" name="caucstartjobres"/> </operation> <operation name="CAUCJobReport"> <input message="tns1:CAUCJobReportReq" name="caucjobreportreq"/> <output message="tns1:CAUCJobReportRes" name="caucjobreportres"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="CAUCJobSoapBinding" type="tns1:CAUCJobPort"> <wsdlsoap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="CAUCStartJob"> <wsdlsoap:operation soapAction=""/> <input name="caucstartjobreq"> <wsdlsoap:header message="tns1:CAUCStartJobReq" part="SoapHeader" use="literal"/> <wsdlsoap:body parts="CAUCStartJobIn" use="literal"/> </input> <output name="caucstartjobres"> <wsdlsoap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <operation name="CAUCJobReport"> <wsdlsoap:operation soapAction=""/> <input name="caucjobreportreq"> <wsdlsoap:header message="tns1:CAUCJobReportReq" part="SoapHeader" use="literal"/> <wsdlsoap:body parts="CAUCJobReportIn" use="literal"/> </input> <output name="caucjobreportres"> <wsdlsoap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="CAUCJobService"> <port binding="tns1:CAUCJobSoapBinding" name="CAUCJobService"> <wsdlsoap:address location="http://localhost:8080/cauc/services/CAUCJobService"/> </port> </service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://edb.com/ws/cauc" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://edb.com/ws/cauc" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:complexType name="CAUCRequestType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Command" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="CommandLine" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Command line options (eg: -foo bar -novalue -verbose true -JobId 9827272). Predefined options: -JobId: mandatory and is a unique job identifier -ReturnUrl: used in StartJob to specifies the JobReport endpoint -ReturnCode: used in JobReport. 0 ok, 4 warning, 8 fatal -ResultText: used in JobReport to provide addtional textual information</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CAUCResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ReturnState" type="ResponseStateType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseStateType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ErrorStatus" type="xsd:boolean"/> <xsd:element name="ErrorCode" type="xsd:int"/> <xsd:element name="Message" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="NativeError" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="LogSequence" type="xsd:long"/> <xsd:element name="errorItem" type="errorItemType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Optional extention items - key/value pairs are used for extented errorinforamtion.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="errorItemType"> <xsd:attribute name="key" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="value" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="CAUCStartJob" type="CAUCRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="CAUCStartJobResponse" type="CAUCResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="CAUCJobReport" type="CAUCRequestType"/> <xsd:element name="CAUCJobReportResponse" type="CAUCResponseType"/> </xsd:schema>
